title: Jonas Willibald Schmid
text:
Postdoc / Stockholm University
Department of Political Science
DEMCOOP- project



  Google Scholar 
  ORCID 
  Bluesky 
  University Profile 





I am currently a Postdoc at Stockholm University, working on the DEMCOOP- project, led by Jonas Tallberg. Before coming to Stockholm, I received my PhD from the University of Oslo for my dissertation “Patterns of minister turnover across regime types” in 2024.
My current research focuses primarily on the effects of regime type on international cooperation, the interplay of political institutions and elites, and autocratic politics. My work on these topics has been published in journals such as Perspectives on Politics, Democratization, and Political Studies.




The interplay of political institutions and elites
Autocratic politics
International cooperation






 PhD, Political Science, 2024University of Oslo


 M.A., Political Science & Public Administration, 2019University of Konstanz


 M.Res., Political Science, 2019Pompeu Fabra University


 B.A., Political Science, 2017Technical University Dresden
